name: Spices
description: Aromatic dried seeds, fruits, roots, bark, or vegetative substances primarily used for flavoring, coloring, or preserving food. Highly valued trade goods.

varieties.notes: Black pepper, a cornerstone of the spice trade.
Sweet and aromatic, used in desserts and savory dishes.

historicalNotes.historicalSignificance: The spice trade was a major source of wealth for Venice. Control over spice routes was fiercely contested.
historicalNotes.culturalContext: Spices were a status symbol, and their use in cuisine indicated wealth and sophistication.
